tips.online_time: Online time refers to the game time recorded by VRCX for the current day.
tips.click_Y_axis: Click Y-axis label to navigate to the instance details or open User dialog.
tips.click_instance_name: Click instance name to open Previous Instance Info dialog.
tips.accuracy_notice: Info from local database may not be accurate

application.disable_gpu_acceleration_tooltip: Only change this option if you know what you're doing, may fix issues with UI, requires restarting VRCX
application.disable_vr_overlay_gpu_acceleration_tool: VR Overlay GPU acceleration can cause VRCX to crash or cause VRAM memory leaks, requires restarting VRCX

logging.empty_avatar: Log avatars in feed without names

automation.auto_state_change_tooltip: Automatically change status when there are other people in the instance (Alone / Company)
automation.auto_invite_request_accept_tooltip: Automatically accept invite requests from favorite friends

legal_notice.info: VRCX is an assistant application for VRChat that provides information about and managing friendship. This application makes use of the unofficial VRChat API SDK.
legal_notice.disclaimer1: VRCX is not endorsed by VRChat and does not reflect the views or opinions of VRChat or anyone officially involved in producing or managing VRChat properties. VRChat and all associated properties are trademarks or registered trademarks of VRChat Inc. VRChat Â© VRChat Inc.
legal_notice.disclaimer2: pypy & Natsumi are not responsible for any problems caused by VRCX. Use at your own risk!

side_panel.group_by_instance_tooltip: Enabling this will group friends by instance when there is more than one friend in the same instance.
side_panel.hide_friends_in_same_instance_tooltip: Hide Friends from Friend List When They Are in the Same Instance.
side_panel.split_favorite_friends_tooltip: Separate favorite friends into their individual groups.

user_dialog.export_vrcx_memos_into_vrchat_notes: Export VRCX Memos into VRChat notes

steamvr_wrist_overlay.menu: Menu: Vive Menu, Index B, Oculus Y/B Buttons

discord_presence.description: * Only active while VRChat is running.
discord_presence.enable_tooltip: Recommended to disable Rich Presence in VRChat config.json to stop it from conflicting

pictures.auto_delete_prints_from_vrc: Delete Old Prints from VRC when reaching print limit

relaunch_vrchat.description: Rejoin last instance when VRChat crashes

auto_cache_management.header: Automatically Manage Cache When Closing VRChat
auto_cache_management.description: Auto delete old versions from cache

save_instance_prints_to_file.description: Save spawned prints to your VRChat Pictures folder
save_instance_prints_to_file.crop: Automatically remove white border from prints
save_instance_prints_to_file.crop_convert_old: Would you like to crop all prints that have already been saved?

save_instance_stickers_to_file.description: Save placed stickers to your VRChat Pictures folder

save_instance_emoji_to_file.description: Save spawned emoji to your VRChat Pictures folder

youtube_api.enable_tooltip: Fetches video titles for use with gameLog and duration for overlay progress bar

video_progress_pie.enable_tooltip: Requires SteamVR overlay to be enabled

launch_commands.show_confirmation_on_switch_avatar_enabl: Show confirmation diaglog before switching avatars
launch_commands.show_confirmation_on_switch_avatar_toolt: When disabled VRCX will not come to the front when switching avatars and ask for confirmation

screenshot_helper.description: Store world ID, world name and players inside the instance inside the file metadata of any pictures you take in-game.
screenshot_helper.description_tooltip: Unfortunately, windows doesn't support viewing PNG text chunks(few things do) natively, but you can view it using a command-line tool like exiftool, a png chunk inspector, or a hex editor.
screenshot_helper.modify_filename_tooltip: Will add the World ID to screenshot filename, in addition to file metadata.

app_launcher.folder_tooltip: To auto-launch apps with VRChat, place shortcuts in this folder.

cache_debug.gpu_fix_warning: Only enable this option if the SteamVR overlay isn't working and you have 2 GPUs

user_generated_content.description: Open or set the folder where content such as 'Prints' and 'Stickers' are stored.

event_hud.enable_tooltip: Requires SteamVR overlay to be enabled

timeout_hud.enable_tooltip: Requires SteamVR overlay to be enabled

launch_options.description: These options are for advanced users only.

vrcx_updater.ready_for_update: Ready for install, restart VRCX to apply.

launch.short_url_notice: Short URL's expire after a set period of time

discord_names.description: Click load missing entries in the Friends List tab to search entire friends list

world_import.description: Enter a list of world IDs

avatar_import.description: Enter a list of avatar IDs

friend_import.description: Enter a list of user IDs

invite_to_group.description: Don't spam invite users, you'll get rate limited.

note_export.description1: This process will export all of your VRCX memos and import them into VRChat notes.
note_export.description2: Be warned of the following limitations:
note_export.description3: - API endpoint has a rate limit that requires a large delay between requests.
note_export.description6: - No new lines (they will replaced with a space).
note_export.description7: - This will overwrite any existing VRChat notes for these users.
note_export.description8: - Any edits made here wont affect VRCX memos but will affect VRChat notes once exported.

invite_response_message.confirmation: Are you sure you want to send?

gallery_icons.flipbook_info: Select a 1024x1024 PNG spritesheet to use as an animated emoji, available frame grid sizes: 4, 16 or 64 (max FPS 64, max frames 64)

open_source.description: VRCX is based on open source software. It was possible because of their contribution.

direct_access_omni.description: Enter a User/World/Instance/Avatar/Group URL or ID (UUID)

change_world_capacity.description: Enter world maximum capacity (hard cap), Max: 80

change_table_size.description: Limit amount of entries loaded from database to UI pages, larger table sizes will impact RAM usage and performance (default: 1000, max: 10000)

auto_clear_cache.description: Enter amount of hours, larger values may impact RAM usage and performance (default: 24, disabled: 0)
